snippet.title: Detective Patch trailer (Mother Direct 2024)
snippet.description:
🔎THE MOTHER DIRECT TRAILER IS HERE!!!
Wishlist on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2410100/Detective_Patch/
———————————————————————————

❗️WATCH THE MOTHER DIRECT: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=PHlB4wvYOnk

Detective Patch is an adorable 2D side-scrolling turn based RPG where you solve mysteries and interrogate enemies. 

Explore a giant plaza filled with weird characters, exiting locations, and possibly uncover the secret surrounding a powerful artifact. Demo releases soon!

— NEW VIDEOS COMING SOON—

Follow Detective Patch’s Twitter: https://x.com/detective_patch

Follow our Twitter: https://
twitter.com/AxxessGamez

Play our Games: https://itch.io/profile/axxessgamez
